com.jrfom.gw2.api.model.crafting

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jrfom.gw2.api.model.crafting.Recipe

  • @Gw2ApiVersion(value="v1")
public class Recipe
extends Object
    Represents an in-game crafting recipe as is returned by /v1/recipe_details.

        public ArrayList<String> getDisciplines()
        The list of crafting disciplines (e.g. "Armorsmith" or "Weaponsmith") that is allowed to use the recipe.
        Returns:
        An array of string disciplines.
